explanation: [0-0] A man with curly hair, wearing glasses and a black top, looks ahead. Behind him is a yellow-striped wooden wall with gray squares, on which the text "R.I." is written. There are white subtitles at the bottom of the screen. There is some smoke in the air.
[0-4] Then the man in black shakes his head helplessly while pointing down, then spreads his hands. Smoke continues to rise around him, and then the man in black looks to the right.
